component.text:
Activity â€“ Calculate the Number of Hosts (Advanced)

In this activity, you are given the network address, subnet mask, binary network address, and binary subnet mask.

Enter the number of hosts that are available for addressing in the Number of Valid Hosts field.
You have not correctly calculated the number of hosts, based on the network address and subnet mask. Please click Reset to try again.
You have correctly calculated the number of hosts, based on the network address and subnet mask. Please click New Number to continue.
